title.native: ヒプノシスマイク-Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima +
title.romaji: Hypnosis Mic -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima+
title.english: HYPNOSISMIC -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima PLUS

description: The second season of Hypnosis Mic: Division Rap Battle - Rhyme Anima. Unlike the first season, which depicted the first division rap battle, it will be set after the second Division Rap Battle.
synonyms: ヒプノシスマイク -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima Season 2
Hypnosis Mic -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima Plus

tags.name: Hip-hop Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of hip-hop, not to be applied to anime that use hip-hop in its soundtrack.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Matriarchy
tags.description: Prominently features a country that is ruled by a Queen or a society that is dominated by female inheritance.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: Clone
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an artificial exact copy of another organism.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Gangs
tags.description: Centers around gang organizations.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Police
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of law enforcement officers.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Yakuza
tags.description: Centered around Japanese organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

title.native: ヒプノシスマイク -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima
映画 ヒプノシスマイク -Division Rap Battle-
ヒプノシスマイク - Division Rap Battle - FINAL

name.native: トム・ウィスパー・ウェザコック
アイリス・イノセント・トレイター

node.description:
**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/katsuono)**

**Katsumi Ono** is a Japanese director, supervisor, episode director and storyboard artist.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/芝美奈子)

Noted for her character designs on [Black Butler](https://anilist.co/anime/4898/), [Noir](https://anilist.co/anime/272/), [Tegami Bachi](https://anilist.co/anime/6444/) among many others.

[Website](http://evilline.com/)

**EVIL LINE RECORDS** is a Japanese record label.

[Website](http://evilline.com/)

**EVIL LINE RECORDS** is a Japanese record label.

__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1314120680091209728)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/154741/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yuuta16597) | [ArtStation](https://www.artstation.com/yuuta16597) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/10832778/artworks) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yuuta16597/)

Freelance Vietnamese animator and founder of Suzuhana Studio.
